statements: UPDATE product_demand_forecasting SET sales_data = '{"forecast": 100}' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE product_demand_forecasting SET market_factors = '{"trend": "high"}', product_name = 'Product X' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE product_demand_forecasting SET market_factors = '{"consumer_trends": "upward", "competition": "stable"}', sales_data = '{"quarterly_sales": [150, 200, 180, 220]}' WHERE product_id = 123
UPDATE product_demand_forecasting SET sales_data = '{"quarterly_sales": [120, 190, 170, 210]}', market_factors = '{"consumer_trends": "downward", "competition": "increasing"}' WHERE product_id = 456
UPDATE SalesData SET quantity_sold = 50 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE MarketFactors SET factor_value = 8.75 WHERE factor_id = 3;
UPDATE SalesData SET quantity_sold = 50 WHERE product_id = 101 AND sale_date = '2022-06-15';
UPDATE MarketFactors SET factor_value = 1.25, factor_name = 'Economy' WHERE factor_id = 2;
UPDATE sales_data SET sales_amount = 1000.50 WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE market_factors SET factor_value = 1.25, factor_name = 'New Factor' WHERE factor_id = 456;
UPDATE sales_data SET sales_amount = 1500.00, sale_date = '2023-07-15' WHERE product_id = 100
UPDATE market_factors SET factor_value = 1.25, factor_name = 'Inflation Rate' WHERE factor_id = 5
UPDATE sales_data SET sales_amount = 2000 WHERE product_id = '6a6b70f7-b9a1-4d1d-9a3e-e04bd2b2ce71';
UPDATE product_catalog SET category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = '0e98b193-3f80-442a-90fc-2c0caac6b1cc';
UPDATE sales_data SET sales_amount = 1500 WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE product_catalog SET category = 'New Category', product_name = 'New Product Name' WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Sales SET quantity = 20, price = 15.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE MarketFactors SET factor_value = 0.75, date = '2022-05-15' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Sales SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = price * 1.1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET category = 'Electronics', price = 1500 WHERE supplier_id = 3;
